Package net.proteusframework.core.automation Description

Task automation API.

This is used for repeated tasks and for data conversions where the result of running the tasks is recorded in the database. For data conversions, this will be the SQLStatements executed. For tasks, it can be anything.

Tasks and DataConversions can be run via the AutomationServlet defined in the CMS module. DataConversions can also be run from the Proteus Shell.

AbstractTask has methods that can be used to determine if DatabaseObjects exist.
